Text.Page:
We need backup for north Habere. So far they've been able to hold off Thulsa's army, but they're hanging by a thread.

Sichel at the northern gate can direct you to the Remote Lodge. May Kaia bless you.

This road takes you northeast to the Remote Lodge.

It's the only way to access the lodge, and it's guarded by undead lancers.

If you defeat the lancers, however, it'll relieve us of a great burden.

Wow, welcome! Thank you for coming all the way through piles of rotten corpses.

I'm Prefect Khubyar. Nice to meet you, !
